credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Study after Bolognese Architecture and Sculpture; Verso: Geometric Designs
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and bistre wash over traces of black chalk on off-white wove paper
description: Part of sketchbook page with 1901-39-1375.  Left image shows Reno, bordered and crossed by houses; water pours from houses in foreground; right image: Mercanzia, shown from portico.
name: Drawing
